data.product_name: UnbuckleMe Car Seat Buckle Release Tool - As Seen on Shark Tank - Makes it Easy to Unbuckle a Child's Car Seat for Parents, Grandparents & Older Children (1 Pack, Black & White)

4.title: Distributions of Sentiment

summary.topics: carseat, lifesaver, saver, granddaughter, arthritic, thumb, grandkids, harness, grandma, unbuckle, arthritis, seat, grandchild, gadget, grandmother, thanks, great, hand, thank, buckle, button, nice, belt, finger, baby, best, easier, grandson, this, helpful, amazing, help, glad, worked, wonderful, recommend, used, unbuckled, fantastic, ease, grateful, daughter, such, and love

price.review: It didnt really fit well over the buckle so it is still difficult to unbuckle

easy.review: Every time I have my grandson I always apologize to him because it takes me forever to get him out of his car seat.  Thank you, thank you, thank you!  I never have to say that gma is not strong enough to unbuckle his car seat.  This is such a simple and easy to use product.  I am so glad I saw this on Shark Tank.
I was amazed how easy it was to use to unbuckle the car seat, I will recommend to all my friends!!

I wish I had this 4 years ago when my first grandchild was born! I purchased this to use on my second grandchilds car seat. I was blown away at the ease of using this product! No more struggling with that red button to release her from her car seat. So quick, no more frustration, no more thumb discomfort.  Thank you, thank you. Two thumbs up
Love how easy it is to now unbuckle my granddaughter car seat
A simple solution to releasing the baby's harness from his car seat and no more broken nails!
Easy to use.  I've struggled to open the car seat buckle.  Now it takes two seconds.  I love it.
Very easy to use especially with arthritis in your fingers.  Saver
I like the simplicity of the product it not rocket science on how to use it and Im glad it was prime eligible for fast shipping!
Easy to use to get my grandaughter out of her car seat. I dont have lot off strength in my hands to undo her seat belt. This is best ever.
Easy and convenient! My son loves to feel independent when it is time to unload the car.

quality.review: exactly what you expect
Great product! My daughter can now unbuckle herself without assistance
This thing is amazing! So quick and easy to use! My thumbs love it!!
I like it!!
I love the shape and the color variety is nice. Very user friendly.
Love this tool so much
Before you had a deal on shark tank I already ordered it during the show.  I am so grateful for this product!!
Saw this on Shark Tank and couldn't wait to get it. I've always had trouble with getting my grandchildren out of their car seats - my thumbs just aren't strong enough!
Yes good
IT is great!  During this Covid time I am so grateful to have a way to cut off seconds while getting my grandson out of his car seat (close face to face contact, even masked).
This really works well. I am so happy to have this little gadget to make it easier fro me to get my grandchildren out of the car seat. Definitely recommend.
This tool is wonderful and it soo helpful and easy to use.  Wish I would have had this 3 babies ago.  Thank you!
Have little  feelings in fingers  and no strength  in thumb can open seat  belts in seconds  and no struggles  love it great  product
Great product! Perfect for school drop offs and grandparents!

Once this item is manipulated to the correct spot it definitely works. However, the idea of it relieving the stress on your hands to open fails when it becomes as difficult to manipulate over the button.
Once you get it in position, its very easy to squeeze to release the buckle.  Before getting this product,  I was having trouble with not having enough thumb strength to release the buckles.
My wife loves it!

Hands down one of the best products Ive ordered. Baby number three on the way so we are moving my 4 year old to the third row. She can buckle just fine but has always struggled with undoing the crotch buckle. Ill be honest, I didnt have much expectation for this but it is so easy to use and she loves the independence it gives her! I also love not having to bend over halfway to the back of the car and let her out. She even likes to help get little sis out of the car when we get home just so she can use the unbuckle me!

When my daughter outgrew her car seat and I wasn't ready to put her into a high back booster yet, we got a new carseat that she unfortunately wasn't able to unbuckle on her own anymore. I learned of this product, bought it and tried it out and it works! My 5 year old is again able to get herself out of her seat and while it can be tough to slide onto the buckle for her she is learning it quickly, and it is easy to use. The plastic is good quality and doesn't twist or bend other than how it's supposed to.
This product is amazing!  My 6 year old loves it and it is so easy to use.  Makes school drop off much easier!  We're buying a 2nd one for my husband's car.

As a Great Grandma with weak fingers I was really happy to find this.  Makes it so much easier to get the bottom restraint "unbuckled".  My only suggestion would be to find a way to attach it to the car seat so it is always where you need it.  As of now it is on my key ring and that works.
I liked it easy to use. Ive never been able to unbuckle my grandkids cause Im just not strong enough. But this was very useful. Thanks
My son was so excited to use this and loves being able to unbuckle himself.
I have long nails and a grandson in a car seat, this is perfect for unlatching 5point harness

This was our second unbuckle me. It works fantastic. My child has been able to unbuckle himself* since he was 4 using this product. However.. they break after being used several times. I am disappointed, because this is supposed to be the easiest on the market to use.. but its a real bummer having to buy a new one every time it breaks. *make sure the product does not stay with your child while the vehicle is in motion.
Works amazing for people with acrylic nails

This is a great product!! I bought it because I wanted to teach my daughter how to unbuckle her carseat. We have only had it for a few days, and she has mastered this skill. I, of course, keep the tool until we are stopped and ready to get out. Great product

carseat.review: I purchased unbuckleme so that my mother could use to take my daughter out of the carseat easier and my mom has been raving how much faster and easier it is now to get my daughter out of the seat. Her fingers usually hurt trying to push down the buttons and trying to pull and both her and my daughter would get frustrated trying to get out the seat. Now it's easier that even my husband and I use it. We will be ordering another one for the next grandmother to use.
I have the nuna car seat and wear short acrylics. Purchased this to help open my newborns car seat. Doesnt help me unbuckle. Its definitely a design flaw. WORTHLESS

Very helpful for get a car seat unbuckled whether you have arthritis or long nails. Its a bit bulky and annoying to carry around or keep track of. I have found a slimmer option that stay on the buckle at all times and works great.
I can actually open my grandkids car seats now without asking for help I love it and Ive already recommended it to others
Dont have strength in my wrist/ hand anymore. This helps get grandchildren out of car seats when Im along.

I have twin Great Grandsons and this Great Grandma can not push that lil red button to unlock their car seats but now they can when told to do so it is great. Thanks oh yes they have twin sister and brother coming up too

My 5.5 year old has low muscle tone and is old and mature enough to be allowed to unbuckle himself, but just couldnt pinch the bottom buckle. I showed him once how to use it and he was a pro from there on out! He keeps it in the cup holder of his car seat and knows he can only use it when we stop and mama says its time to unbuckle. With 3 kiddos, having one who can officially be in charge of unbuckling himself is a huge plus!
Im not sure how and why but mine arrived dirty.
Couldn't use with my style of car seat, my release button is covered by a protective padding and the tool doesn't fit in

lifesaver.review: I have always had problems getting my grandson out of his car seat... until I discovered UnbuckleMe!

Got this for my mom, who was struggling to get my daughter unbuckled from her car seat. It was a game changer! Super easy to use! I ended up getting one for myself after seeing how easy it was for my mom to use - its great to use after getting a manicure!
This item worked so easily. So thankful for something like this tool to help me with my granddaughters car seat buckle. Life saver. Works very efficiently!! I am 69 years old.

This simple little "thing" is making such a BIG difference in my life.  Why did it take so long for someone to come up with this?  But thank goodness, these two ladies did it.  Saw them on Shark Tank, ordered it as soon as the program ended.  Bless you wonderful ladies

I love this product!  I have long nails and I kept hurting my thumbs trying to get the seat buckle undone.  Not only does it make life so much easier I taught my grandson how to use it so he can unbuckle it in case of an emergency!  My mom loves hers and now I dont worry about her not being able to get the kids out of the car seat when shes alone with them.  Best investment Ive made on a everyday use product!!

I have had another unbuckle gadget for my grandchildrens car seat. But it was too difficult to squeeze. The Unbuckle Me tool is so easy to use and a lifesaver when you have arthritis in your hands. This is truly a 5 Star tool.

Im having baby #3 next month and my 6 year old will have to be in the third row and has been unable to unbuckled his new car seat by himself and this has been a game changer!! We showed him how it works and hes unbuckled by himself every single time.
I bought this after ripping my nail on the Car seat buckle. This is a life saver for opening the thought buckles. Its easy to use especially if you have any kind of mobility issues with your hands.

This is the 4th Unbuckle me item I have bought! For a grandma with arthritic thumbs this is a MUST HAVE.  I keep 2 in my car (one by the car seat and one in the glove box), one in the kitchen in case I have trouble unbuckling the harness in the high chair, and one in the stroller for the same reason.  I recommend these to everyone who has trouble or pain opening the buckles on anything!  This is the most helpful device ever.
Amazing tool for my mother in law that has arthritis!
This is a must have for Mommys like myself who get their nails done & are tired of bruising our knuckles to unbuckle car seats!

saver.review: I bought this for my son so that he could unbuckle his own carseat.  He was able to pick up how to use it after 4-6 car rides.  It's nice for a mom of 3 because it's one less buckle I need to undo.
Great for unbuckling the car seat !!
We are senior citizens who babysit for a toddler and we could not undo his car seat buckles.  This product works and has made our lives easier. An excellent solution to many frustrating experiences.
As a senior citizen it makes unbuckle my grandchild just that much easier,  the product does this.
This saves my poor arthritic thumbs from struggling to unlatch my granddaughters booster seat.  Thank you!

I have not actually used it yet. I will be staying with my 5 yr old great grandson next week while his parents welcome a new baby . I have problems getting the buckle undone on his car seat and saw this on shark tank and it was exactly what I need to help me push that button. I really think it will help me get him out of the car seat with ease.

A game changer. My 9 year old can unbuckle her younger sister. It helps so much to get everyone out of the car before the 7 year old gets bored and wanders off. It helps me as well. I have arthritis and this helps on days my hands are weak.
This tool has been very helpful to me as I have had difficulties unbuckling my grandsons in their car seats. This makes it quick and easy and saves me a lot of frustration and sore thumbs.

Love, love, love it. I have RA and the struggle trying to unbuckle a carseat can be rough. UnbuckleMe is a hand saver and a child pleaser. It took some getting used to but it is such a great product. I was so excited to finally get one and I use it every trip, every out of the car. Getting the product out of the packaging was difficult. Rethink that idea as the tool was made for people with hand issues but the packaging required me to get help.

My kindergartner was struggling to get the bottom buckle undone in her seat. When I bought this, she was able to figure it out quickly and now never wants help getting in and out of her seat!! I would have to park at the school previously so the time and convenience has made this a great purchase!
I can easily unbundled my grandson from his cartseat Best thing ever
Lifesaver for any mamas with nails. I always struggled to get the bottom latch undone and broke several nails in the process. This makes it so much easier!
Has made my life easier no more broken nails . Unbuckling my kids
We keep this hooked on to the top of the car seat so its always handy. I love this option to save my nails!

granddaughter.review: This Grandma's thumbs thanks you for this great product!  I was really having trouble pushing the buckle hard enough to release the belt. This product has made the task much easier! Thanks for this wonderful product!
This Grandmama Loves this tool! Would recommend to everyone whose hands are weak!
It was an unexpected pleasure to unbuckle my granddaughter from her car seat  with no difficulity at all. The best invention ever!!!!
My daughter can now unbuckle herself.

arthritic.review: So happy to have discovered this product!  My grandchildren would wait patiently for me to "set them free".  I struggled, sometimes even worried, that I would not be able to release them in an emergency. My arthritic fingers ached!  Now with my "Unbuckle Me",  my mind is at ease, as well as my fingers and thumb :)

As soon as I saw this on "Shark Tank" I bought it. It was exactly what I've been looking for since I started driving with my new grand baby. Like the grandma in the duo that invented this, I have arthritis in my thumbs. Many times I have struggled to unlock the straps, almost to the point of panic. Because of the stay home orders here, I haven't been able to use my new Unbuckleme with my granddaughter in tow, but I tried it out without her in the seat and it worked exactly as advertised. Can't wait to use it with my granddaughter!

My wife has arthritis and it is very difficult for her to unbuckle our granddaughter's car seat.  She saw this item on Shark Tank and said order this for me on Amazon.  So I did and when it came we happened to be baby sitting our granddaughter and we had to run errands.  When we reached our destination my wife used the UnbuckleMe and in seconds the car seat was unlatched where as she would have struggled with it for minutes at a time.  GREAT IDEA and GREAT PRODUCT.  Thank you.
very easy to use. i am great grandparent with arthritis
This product is amazing!!  I had so much trouble unbuckling my grandchildrens car seats due to my arthritic thumbs. With the UnbuckleMe I can now do it with ease!  I highly recommend it!
I have arthritis in my thumb.  Before unbuckleme  i had to ask others to help unbucke the seat.  Now i can unbuckle with ease and no struggle.

Hoping my 4 year old child could use it, he cannot. My daughter tries to help too but I guess because of the thickness, he says it hurts him. I have arthritis in my thumbs so this is better than using my hands alone but it does need to be gently inserted behind the buckle
Got this for my Mother to use when she has my son. Between her long nails and arthritis she had a hard time unbuckling his seat. She loves this product and uses it with ease.
I have arthritis and this has made it so much easier to unbuckle my grand babies car seat.
This is fantastic! I am a grandmother with arthritis who has struggled to unfastened my grandkids from their car seats. Not anymore! So glad I tried this product.

review_types.best_review: Hands down one of the best products Ive ordered. Baby number three on the way so we are moving my 4 year old to the third row. She can buckle just fine but has always struggled with undoing the crotch buckle. Ill be honest, I didnt have much expectation for this but it is so easy to use and she loves the independence it gives her! I also love not having to bend over halfway to the back of the car and let her out. She even likes to help get little sis out of the car when we get home just so she can use the unbuckle me!
review_types.worst_review: It didnt really fit well over the buckle so it is still difficult to unbuckle
